scripts.test: npm run test -w @lyvely/common && npm run test -w @lyvely/server
scripts.core:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/core-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/web" "npm run build -w @lyvely/core"
scripts.timers:timers: npm run build -w @lyvely/timers-interface && npm run build -w @lyvely/timers
scripts.time-series:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/time-series-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/time-series-web" "npm run build -w @lyvely/time-series"
scripts.calendar-plan:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/calendar-plan-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/calendar-plan-web" "npm run build -w @lyvely/calendar-plan"
scripts.tasks:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/tasks-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/tasks" "npm run build -w @lyvely/tasks-web"
scripts.habits:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/habits-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/habits" "npm run build -w @lyvely/habits-web"
scripts.milestones:build: npm run build -w @lyvely/milestones-interface && concurrently "npm run build -w @lyvely/milestones" "npm run build -w @lyvely/milestones-web"
